descriptionNullable:
### Context

I want to help medical practitioners to prescribe recommended drugs based on their practicing specialty, years of practicing and previous suggested drugs in prescriptions by other providers or practitioners.

The data is created pre-processed data used by [This Kernel](https://www.kaggle.com/llefebure/predicting-specialty-with-prescribing-behavior) where the source was in json format


### Content

You will find specialty is a doctor's or medical practitioners expertise and "years of practice" is the practice duration. each row is a provider's prescription where the drugs are suggested along with others relatively 


### Acknowledgements

If you find any wrong with data please keep your comments here


### Inspiration

I want to make a remarkable brain that will suggest drugs
title: drugs prescriptions with providers profile
subtitle: Drugs recommendation along with others
